title: Light years
creator_credit: Kathryn Millard, Patricia L'Huede and Lexicon Films
brief_description: Light years layers photographs, landscapes and stories to construct a sharply focused portrait of photographer Olive Cotton and the images and philosophies that have shaped her life and work. As one of Australia’s most accomplished photographers with a portfolio spanning sixty years, Olive and her story offer a rich insight into Australian life.
creator_credit_for_label: Kathryn Millard, Patricia L’Huede and Lexicon Films
